lightstep.decorations.description: Configures the appearance of code coverage on a code file.

hide.description: Hide all of the code coverage decorations.

lineBackgroundColors.description: Whether to decorate each line with a background color based on its coverage.

lineHitCounts.description: Whether to decorate the end of each covered line with the hit/branch stats.

lightstep.endpoints.description: The list of LightStep endpoints that are contacted to retrieve coverage data, in order. If empty or not set, https://lightstep.io is used.

items.description: A LightStep endpoint (either https://lightstep.io or LightStep Enterprise).

url.description: The URL for this LightStep endpoint.

token.description: The LightStep API token for this endpoint (required for private repositories).
